name: mcp-go-context
description: Advanced Context Management for AI Coding Assistants - Provides intelligent project analysis, persistent memory, and hybrid documentation fetching

jwt_secret.title: JWT Secret Key
jwt_secret.description: Optional JWT secret for HTTP/SSE authentication (leave empty for stdio-only mode)

config_path.title: Configuration File Path
config_path.description: Optional path to custom configuration file (leave empty for defaults)

project_paths.title: Project Paths
project_paths.description: List of project directories to analyze (comma-separated)

tools.name: analyze-project
tools.description: Analyzes project structure, dependencies, and provides comprehensive context

tools.name: get-context
tools.description: Retrieves relevant context for current task based on files, dependencies, and conversation history

tools.name: fetch-docs
tools.description: Fetches documentation for libraries and dependencies using Context7 API with intelligent fallbacks

tools.name: remember-conversation
tools.description: Stores important context from current conversation for future reference with intelligent tagging

tools.name: dependency-analysis
tools.description: Analyzes project dependencies with security recommendations

tools.name: memory-get
tools.description: Retrieve a memory item by key

tools.name: memory-search
tools.description: Search memories by query or tags with result limiting

tools.name: memory-recent
tools.description: Get recent memories with configurable limits

tools.name: auth-generate-token
tools.description: Generate JWT token for authentication (development use)

prompts.name: analyze-current-project
prompts.description: Perform comprehensive analysis of the current project

prompts.name: smart-context-search
prompts.description: Get intelligent context based on your current task or question

arguments.name: query
arguments.description: What are you working on or need context for?
